title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Case-Based Learning for Coaching Culture Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core elements of coaching culture design within organizations (leadership motivation, relationship management, role modeling).
Learners can analyze real-world corporate cases and propose strategies for implementing a coaching culture.
Learners can practice coaching conversation skills through 10-minute micro-modules in mobile environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
